selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: Feature is mature and adds high value. Promoting to STABLE to finalize core analytics capabilities.
success_criteria: Enabled for 100% of users by default

selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: Critical performance bottleneck identified. Initiating implementation phase starting with worker skeleton.
success_criteria: No regressions in main thread audio processing
selected_for_growth.estimated_roi: Enables future scalability and mobile support

hold_for_growth.reason: Infrastructure not yet ready. Waiting for backend sync service definition.

executive_summary.estimated_impact: Major improvements in both UI value and technical performance foundations.
key_risks: Audio pipeline stability during worker transition
